author: SaraMurray

text:
He covered a local homeless man's death & the life of the 1st death row inmate exonerated by DNA.

“He was both a tender-hearted features writer & a jaded journalist."

He married his wife 5 mos. after their 1st date. Last week was their 33rd anniversary.
author: SaraMurray
